MQTT_USERNAME_DOC: This is the mqtt username (may be empty)
MQTT_PASSWORD_DOC: This is the mqtt password (may be empty)
MQTT_SERVER_DOC: This is the mqtt host (ip adress or fqdn)
MQTT_TOPIC_DOC: This is the mqtt topic to publish on
MQTT_CLIENTID_DOC: This is the client identifier to send mqtt message on behalf of
ERROR_SERVER_EMTPY_MESSAGE: Can't do anything without an mqtt server
ERROR_SERVER_INVALID_MESSAGE: Server must begin with mqtt:// or mqtts://
